title: Eva and Carmen
content: This is Eva from Germany and her Buddy!  Her name is Ka Man, but she likes to be called Carmen. She comes from Hong Kong and studies surveying there. In her free time, Carmen enjoys running, it makes her feel relaxed and fit. She also loves hiking, especially in autumn days when it’s not so hot and she likes to read in chinese. Her favourite places to be are libraries, because it is nice and quiet there.
